docstring.long_description:
Requires an OPEN SERIAL block at the start of the app to connect with
the instrument.
docstring.short_description: Set the output voltage offset for a 33120A function generator.

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The VISA address (requires a OPEN SERIAL node).

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset of the output waveform, in volts.

parameters.name: option
parameters.description: Use the input value, or set to the maximum or minimum.

returns.description: String: Summary of waveform generator settings.
